content.p: The University of Nottingham as an exempt charity, is required to publish certain specific information on its website. All of this information is available on the University of Nottingham website but links are provided here as required. The University's legal name is The University of Nottingham, and the address is: The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD The Charter and Statutes of the University. Following an extensive consultation process, changes to the Charter and Statutes were approved by the Privy Council and came into force on 22 July 2010. The Trustees of the University are the members of University Council. The University's latest Financial Statements. Shape the future and help create a world of possibilities by making a donation or giving your time. Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
